attributes.action: Free meals for all NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: Their work is always long and gruelling but especially in these turbulent times they are entitled to the "protection" that is constantly mentioned by MPs and the PM. Having now left the EU - where are the millions of pounds promised to support the NHS? Our key workers have been selfless and brave throughout the Coronavirus epidemic, all risking and some loosing their lives ,in order to look after us. The very least we can do is provide them with free meals, available at their hospitals when they are at work for nourishment, comfort and a momentary respite. It is crucial for our nurses and doctors to be able to work to their best ability. It is a major and embarrassing flaw in the system, one which needs to be changed - immediately.
attributes.background: The NHS have been constantly praised for their hard work throughout the  pandemic - however, this is not enough

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569251
